Logiciels Installés

Si votre logiciel ne figure pas dans la liste, merci de vous référer à la procédure d'installation.
Le responsable est la personne a contacté pour toute information relative à l'utilisation du logiciel. Pour tout problème technique, merci de vous adresser au personnel du PT6.

En ligne de commande

Logiciels Responsable Description
BLAST Tanguy Basic Local Alignment Search Tool.
Bowtie Tanguy An ultrafast memory-efficient short read aligner.
Bowtie2 Tanguy Fast and sensitive read alignment.
BWA Tanguy Burrows-Wheeler Aligner.
Cufflinks Tanguy Transcript assembly, differential expression, and differential regulation for RNA-Seq.
Eigen Tanguy C++ template library for linear algebra: matrices, vectors, numerical solvers, and related algorithms.
FastQC Tanguy A quality control tool for high throughput sequence data.
FASTX-Toolkit Tanguy The FASTX-Toolkit is a collection of command line tools for Short-Reads FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing.
FreeBayes Lilia Bayesian genetic variant detector.
GATK Tanguy A software package to analyse next-generation resequencing data.
HTSeq Tanguy Analysing high-throughput sequencing data with Python.
JELLYFISH Tanguy Fast, Parallel k-mer Counting for DNA.
MaSuRCA Tanguy MaSuRCA assembler.
Mothur Lilia Fills the bioinformatics needs of the microbial ecology community.
PhyloSift Tanguy Phylogenetic and taxonomic analysis for genomes and metagenomes.
Picard Tanguy Java-based command-line utilities that manipulate SAM files.
PRINSEQ Tanguy PReprocessing and INformation of SEQuence data.
RNA-SeQC Tanguy A java program which computes a series of quality control metrics for RNA-seq data.
SAMTools Tanguy Provides various utilities for manipulating alignments in the SAM format.
SOAPdenovo2 Tanguy Short Oligonucleotide Analysis Package.
SortMeRNA Tanguy A software designed to rapidly filter ribosomal RNA fragments from metatranscriptomic data.
SPAdes Tanguy Genome Assembler.
STAR Tanguy Spliced Transcripts Alignment to a Reference.
TopHat Tanguy A spliced read mapper for RNA-Seq.
Velvet Tanguy Sequence assembler for very short reads.
Librairies Responsable Description
Boost Tanguy Free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries.
PERL modules Tanguy Une collection de modules PERL.
GNU C Library Tanguy La bibliothèque C du projet GNU.
Compilateurs & Co Responsable Description
CMakeTanguy Cross Platform Make.
GCCTanguyThe GNU Compiler Collection includes front ends for C, C++, Objective-C, Fortran, Java, Ada, and Go

Services

Services Responsable Description
Galaxy Tanguy An open, web-based platform for data intensive biomedical research.
QIIME Lilia An open source software package for comparison and analysis of microbial communities.
EtherpadTanguy A highly customizable Open Source online editor providing collaborative editing in really real-time.
DokuWikiTanguy A simple to use and highly versatile Open Source wiki software that doesn't require a database.
wwwblastTanguyA wwwblast installation allows a researcher to use BLAST to search a sequence database using a graphical user interface.
SequenceServerTanguySequenceServer lets you rapidly set up a BLAST+ server with an intuitive user interface for use locally or over the web.
TranSMARTTanguyA knowledge management platform.
RStudioTanguyRStudio is an integrated development environment (IDE) for R.
iRODSTanguyThe Integrated Rule-Oriented Data System.

Applications Graphiques

Ces applications sont à déployer sur vos postes ou sur des postes déportés.
